# Offline Survey Application - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
JavaScript-based offline survey application for iPad with survey builder, kiosk mode, and analytics dashboard.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Survey Builder Interface
- `kiosk.html` - Kiosk Mode for filling surveys
- `analytics.html` - Analytics Dashboard
- `js/` - JavaScript modules
  - `storage.js` - LocalStorage management
  - `builder.js` - Survey builder logic
  - `kiosk.js` - Kiosk mode logic
  - `analytics.js` - Analytics and reporting
- `css/` - Stylesheets
- All data stored in localStorage as JSON

## Technology Stack
- Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+)
- HTML5
- CSS3
- LocalStorage API
- Chart.js for analytics visualization

## Key Features
1. Survey Builder with multiple question types
2. Kiosk Mode with auto-reset after submission
3. Analytics Dashboard with detailed reports
4. Export to CSV/JSON
5. iPad-optimized responsive design
